sub_title: Geoscientist | GIS Data Specialist | Geologist | Remote Sensing Specialist | Satellite Image Analyst | Geospatial Analyst | Data Automation | FME Specialist | CAD/GIS Engineer
summary:
Geologist/GIS data specialist professional with more than 10 years of experience in geosciences, working in several topics ranging from geology to geospatial data analysis, and remote sensing applications. Background in geology/Earth Sciences, geosciences and environment, and Geographical Information Sciences (GIS). Expertise in geological mapping, mapping design, cross-sections, data interpretation and data analysis, geospatial analysis, spatial modeling and interpolation, spatial data visualization, database management, coordinate systems, vector and raster data structures, remote sensing, analysis of satellite images, SQL and python programming languages. Knowledgeable in project management, agile and scrum methodologies. Holding a Professional Certificate in Data Science.

Specialties:
â€¢   Geological Mapping
â€¢   Structural Geology
â€¢   Geospatial Analysis
â€¢   Remote Sensing
â€¢   Data Analysis & Interpretation
â€¢   Environmental Sciences
â€¢   Satellite Imagery
â€¢   Earth Observation
â€¢   Photogrammetry
â€¢   Point Clouds
â€¢   Database Management
â€¢   Core Logging

Software:
â€¢   Cartography & Data Analysis: ESRI suite (ArcGIS, ArcMap, ArcGIS Pro, ArcGIS Online), QGIS
â€¢   Data Translation & Data Analysis: Safe Software FME
â€¢   Remote Sensing: ERDAS Imagine, Sentinel Application Platform (SNAP), Agisoft PhotoScan, Google Earth Engine, Python
â€¢   Database: PostgreSQL, pgAdmin
â€¢   Programming Languages: Python, SQL
â€¢   CAD/Graphics: AutoCAD & CorelDRAW
â€¢   Other:
        â€¢   Python libraries highlight: pandas, geopandas, numpy, seaborn, matplotlib, GDAL, rasterio, folium, shapely
        â€¢   Jupyter Notebooks
